Text.Page:
By the gods!

Did you see that? The butterflies emerged from that weird opening!

We were lucky to witness that. Now that we're able to observe their nest, and maybe get some pure samples of the amber powder, we should be able to develop a cure more quickly.

Don't get me wrong: I'm not enjoying this!
I can't wait any longer. I'll go ahead.
What was that? <PCNAME>, did you see that too?
A butterfly just came out of that opening!
